newsletters.newsletterTitle: Modern JavaScript Libraries: Making Dates Human Again
newsletters.newsletterDescription: Explore modern JavaScript and TypeScript libraries that solve real developer problems. In this newsletter, we dive deep into human-friendly date formatting, natural language processing for timestamps, and building better user experiences with @upendra.manike/smart-date. Perfect for developers building social apps, dashboards, and user-friendly interfaces.
newsletters.targetAudience: Frontend developers, UX designers, Full-stack developers

newsletters.newsletterTitle: Clean Code Series: Declarative API Workflows
newsletters.newsletterDescription: Discover how to eliminate callback hell and build clean, maintainable API workflows. This newsletter covers @upendra.manike/api-chain - a library that makes sequential API calls declarative and easy to manage. Learn patterns for dashboard loading, multi-step forms, and complex data pipelines. Transform your async code from messy chains to beautiful declarative workflows.
newsletters.targetAudience: Backend developers, Full-stack developers, Software architects

newsletters.newsletterDescription: Bundle size matters, especially on mobile. This newsletter explores @upendra.manike/tiny-utils - a modern, tree-shakable alternative to Lodash. Learn how to reduce bundle sizes by 50-70% while maintaining functionality. Perfect for performance-conscious developers building modern web applications. Discover modern ES6+ patterns that replace heavy dependencies.
newsletters.targetAudience: Frontend developers, Performance engineers, Mobile developers

newsletters.newsletterTitle: Smart Caching Strategies for Web Apps
newsletters.newsletterDescription: Caching shouldn't be complicated. This newsletter dives into @upendra.manike/lite-fetcher - a lightweight API client with built-in caching. Learn how to reduce API load, improve performance, and build offline-first applications. Perfect for developers building data-intensive applications. Master caching strategies that make your apps faster and more efficient.
newsletters.targetAudience: Full-stack developers, API developers, Performance engineers

newsletters.newsletterDescription: Animations can make or break user experience. This newsletter covers @upendra.manike/react-motion-kit - prebuilt animation hooks for React. Stop writing the same animation code and start building beautiful, performant UIs with production-ready hooks built on Framer Motion. Learn animation best practices, performance optimization, and accessibility considerations.
newsletters.targetAudience: React developers, Frontend developers, UI/UX designers

commonSettings.subscriptionNote: Your connections and followers will be invited to subscribe automatically
